Name: Golden Prestige
Ingredients: 50 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
5 ml Orange blossom water / Orange flower water
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: “Inspired by the Original Daiquiri, I wanted to create a cocktail that retained the roots of BACARDÍ Carta Blanca. A touch of history and a dash of nobility combined with an oriental touch. The idea is to keep the exoticism of the liquid that Don Facundo bottled 150 years ago and just add a hint of originality.”
History: Swiss BACARDÍ Legacy 2013 winning drink created by Nicholas Michel at Hotel Beau Rivage Palace, Lausanne, Switzerland.
